availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Cunningham (Bourbon Co, Ky, student and prov govt)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, student and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Son of John Cunningham and Polly Cunningham. Married to Rebecca W. Cunningham in Muskingum County, Ohio, on January 7, 1865. Resident in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student in Bourbon County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 311B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Eastern Division, p. 652.
Ohio, County Marriage Records (1774-1993), Various Ohio County Courthouses, Muskingum County Marriages, Film #000865140 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "W.R. Cunningham (Apr 14, 1834-Apr 11, 1919)," Memorial #43704263 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43704263 (accessed October 14, 2019).
KYR-0004-033-0001.
